pages.text: This chapter is the basic line for the development of module technology lines, and in principle, you cannot skip technology line.

pages.title: Primaeval
pages.text: Although there were many technologies developed in the past, now you can only learn how to drill wood for fire.

pages.title: Immersive Engineering
pages.text: Finally, you have some machinery that can prove that you are a higher species.

pages.title: Thermal Expansion
pages.text: At least not that much soot anymore, isn't it?

pages.title: Refined storage
pages.text: It's hard to explain how it was achieved, basically by typing things into an atomic state and storing them in the form of data...

pages.title: Aerospace
pages.text: Roam the galaxy,hope you come back alive..
